title: Dividend per share of Daimler AG 2006 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Dividend per share in euros, containing a total of 14 data points.
Overall Dividend per share in euros has decreased over the Year.
Dividend per share in euros is roughly constant from 2006 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2019.
Maximum Dividend per share in euros, about 3.65 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Dividend per share in euros, of value 0.0 was reported at Year 2009
